Translations.Text: namumayi kantumuttan agrahikkattavar parannu: "namukk malakkukal irakkappetattatent? allenkil nam'mute nathane nam neril kanattatent?” avar svayam peannaccam natikkukayum katuttadhikkaram kattukayum ceytirikkunnu
malakkukale avar kanundinam. ann kurravalikalkk subhavarttayeannumilla. avarinnane parayum: "kakkane; tatukkane!”
appeal avar pravartticcirunna karmannalute nere nam tiriyum. annane namavaye citariya peatipatalannalakkum
svargavakasikal nalla vasasthalavum uttamamaya visramakendravum ullavarayirikkum
akasam peattippilarnn meghapatalam purattuvarikayum malakkukale kuttankuttamayi irakkukayum ceyyunna divasam
ann yathartha adhipatyam paramakarunikanaya allahuvinayirikkum. satyanisedhikalkkanenkil at ere klesakaramaya dinamayirikkum
akramiyaya manusyan khedattal kai katikkunna dinamanat. ann ayal parayum: "ha kastam! nan daivadutaneateappam addehattinre margamavalambiccirunnenkil etra nannayene
enre nirbhagyam! nan innayale kuttukaranakkiyirunnillenkil
enikk udbeadhanam vannettiyasesam avanenne atilninn terriccukalannallea. pisac manusyane sambandhiccitattealam keatiya vancakan tanne.”
daivadutan ann parayum: "natha, enre janam i khur'ane tirttum nirakariccu.”
avvidham ella pravacakanmarkkum kurravalikalaya cila satrukkale nam untakkiyirikkunnu. valikattiyayum sahayiyayum ninre nathan tanne mati

satyanisedhikal ceadikkunnu: "iyalkk i khur'an muluvanum onnicc oresamayam irakkikkeatukkattatent?” ennal at innanettanneyan ventat. ninre hrdayatte urappiccunirttananit. namit itavitt itavitt palatavanayayi otikkelppikkunnu
avar etearu prasnavumayi ninne samipikkukayanenkilum avaykkellam saktamaya n'yayavum vyaktamaya visadikaranavum ninakku nametticcutaratirikkilla
mukhankutti narakattiyilekku tallappetunnavaran erram nicavasthayilullavar. anneyarram pilaccavarum avar tanne
musakku nam vedapustakam nalki. addehatteateappam saheadaran harune sahayiyayi niscayiccu
ennittu nam parannu: "ninnaliruvarum peaku. nam'mute vacanannale tallipparanna janattinre atuttekk.” annane nam avare takarttutarippanamakki

nuhinre janatayeyum nam atutanne ceytu. avar daivadutanmare kallamakki talli. appeal nam avare mukkikkeannu. annane nam avare janannalkk oru drstantamakki. akramikalkku nam neaveriyasiksa orukkiveccittunt
ad, samud, ras'sukar, atinitayile niravadhi talamurakal, ellavareyum nam nasippiccu
ellavarkkum nam mungamikalute jivitanubhavannal vivariccukeatuttirunnu. avasanam avareyeakke nam takartt tarippanamakki
vipattinre mala peytiranniya a nattiluteyum ivar katannupeayittunt. ennittum ivariteannum kantittille? yatharthattilivar uyirttelunnelp ottum pratiksikkattavarayirunnu
ninne kanumpealellam ikkuttar ninne pucchikkukayanallea. avar ceadikkunnu: "iyaleyanea daivam tanre dutanayi ayaccat
nam'mute daivannalile visvasattil nam ksamayeate uraccuninnirunnillenkil avayilninn ivan nam'me terriccukalayumayirunnu.” ennal siksa neril kanunneram avar tiriccariyum, erram valipilaccavar arenn
tanre dehecchaye daivamakkiyavane ni kantea? ennittum avane nervaliyilakkunna badhyata ni elkkukayea
alla, ni karutunnuntea; avarilerepperum kelkkukayum cintikkukayum ceyyunnuvenn. ennalavar kannukalikaleppealeyan. alla; avayekkalum pilaccavaran

ninre nathanekkuricc ni aleaciccuneakkiyittille? ennaneyanavan nilaline nittiyittukeantirikkunnatenn. avanicchiccirunnenkil atine avan ore sthalattutanne niscalamakkumayirunnu. suryane nam nilalin valikattiyakki
pinne nam a nilaline alpalpamayi nam'mute atuttekk curukkikkeantuvarunnu
avanan ninnalkk ravine vastramakkiyat. urakkatte visramavasaravum pakaline unarvuvelayumakkiyatum avan tanne
tanre anugrahattinre munneatiyayi subhasucanayeate karrukale ayaccavanum avanan. manattuninnu nam sud'dhamaya vellam viltti
atuvali catta natine caitan'yamullatakkan. nam srsticca ottuvalare kannukalikaleyum manusyareyum kutippikkanum
nam a malavellatte avarkkitayil vitaranam ceytu. avar cinticcariyan. ennal janannalilerepperum nandiketu kattanan orumpettat
nam icchiccirunnuvenkil ella orea nattilum nam orea takkitukarane niyeagikkumayirunnu
atinal ni satyanisedhikale anusarikkarut. i khur'anupayeagicc ni avareat saktamayi samaram ceyyuka
